infoBox4.heading: Launch Your Next Big Idea
infoBox4.description: At Boomerang, we empower creators to bring their ideas to life. Join our platform and connect with a community ready to support your journey. Whether you're starting out or scaling up, we're here to help you succeed.

infoBox5.heading: Get Started Now
infoBox5.description: Explore our comprehensive guides, tools, and tips designed to help you plan, launch, and grow your projects. From setting goals to engaging your supporters, our resources are crafted to ensure your success on Boomerang.

mission.heading: Our Mission
mission.description: Boomerang was built to launch ideas into reality by empowering creators worldwide through innovative platforms and community.

platform.heading: Our Platform
platform.description: Boomerang is where ideas find their wings. It's a place where creators share their inspirations, and communities unite to make them a reality. From the spark of an idea to its shining moment, Boomerang connects you directly with those who share your passion.

community.heading: Our Community
community.description: It all begins with you. Your spark ignites a movement. Friends become supporters, and supporters become champions. Together, we create a ripple effect. Our community unites creators and backers alike, bound by a shared love for innovation and artistry.

values.heading: Our Values
values.description: Your vision. Your voice. No compromises. No exhaustive grant applications. No demands to alter your message. At Boomerang, you hold the reins of your creation. Backers join you on your journey, becoming part of something extraordinary.

commitment.heading: Our Commitment
commitment.description: We're dedicated to cultivating a space where creativity thrives. By removing barriers and empowering creators, we democratize the artistic process. We prioritize meaningful impact over all else, ensuring our actions reflect our core values.

team.heading: Our Team
team.description: We're a collective of dreamers and doers—designers, developers, artists, and athletes—all passionate about supporting the creative ecosystem. We've navigated the path of bringing ideas to life, and we're here to help you every step of the way.

journey.heading: Our Journey Has Just Begun...
journey.description: Join us as we continue to empower creators and communities around the world.

shareVision.heading: Share Your Vision
shareVision.description: Introduce your creative idea to the world. Set a funding goal and choose a campaign duration between 1 and 90 days. Offer unique rewards that backers will receive when your project comes to life.

engageCommunity.heading: Engage Your Community
engageCommunity.description: Reach out to friends, family, and fans to support your journey. Boomerang's all-or-nothing funding model ensures you have the necessary resources to realize your vision. A simple 5% fee applies only if your project is successfully funded.

bringIdeas.heading: Bring Ideas to Life
bringIdeas.description: Receive your funds just one week after a successful campaign. Then, transform your idea into reality and share the experience with those who believed in you.

builtForCreators.heading: Built for Creators
builtForCreators.description: Boomerang is a platform dedicated exclusively to creative projects. It's a place where your ideas find support, and your creativity finds a home.

description.part1: Our all-or-nothing approach means you begin your project fully equipped. For
description.part2: , we offer flexible funding options tailored to your needs.

supportiveCommunity.heading: A Supportive Community
supportiveCommunity.description: Your journey starts with a single step. As you share your idea, your community grows—friends become supporters, supporters become champions. Together, we turn inspiration into reality.

committedDifference.heading: Committed to Making a Difference
committedDifference.description: As a Public Benefit Corporation, we measure success by the positive impact we create. Our mission is to launch ideas into reality, empowering creators everywhere.

faq1.question: Who can launch a project on Boomerang?
faq1.answer: Project creation is available to individuals and organizations in Thailand who meet these criteria:
points: Identification: Valid address, bank account, and government-issued ID in Thailand.
Financial: Possess a major credit or debit card.

faq2.question: What if Boomerang isn't available in my country yet?
faq2.answer: We're actively working to expand our platform to more countries. Stay tuned for updates.

faq3.question: How does Boomerang support creators?
faq3.answer: We provide tools and resources at every stage of your journey. Our Creator Resources offer insights and best practices to help you plan, promote, and fulfill your project successfully.

faq4.question: How does all-or-nothing funding work?
faq4.answer: Backers are only charged if your project reaches its funding goal within the set timeframe. This ensures you have the full budget needed to bring your idea to life.

faq5.question: Who can support my project?
faq5.answer: Support often begins with friends, family, and fans. As your project gains momentum, word spreads, and more people who share your passion will join in.

faq6.question: What are the fees?
faq6.answer: Upon successful funding, Boomerang applies a 5% fee to the funds raised. Our payment processor, 2C2P, also applies standard processing fees. No fees are collected if your project doesn't reach its goal.

faq7.question: What kinds of projects can I launch on Boomerang?
faq7.answer: Boomerang supports creative projects across categories like art, design, technology, music, and film. We also support non-profit fundraisers and charitable causes in a dedicated section.
